name: Click (Tobero)
description:
NOTE: At the moment you need to play it with a friend. Singleplayer will come soon. At the moment only 2 people can game against each other. If 2 others join on your server, the will play against them.

Version v1.0:
  • Multiplayer
  • Server selection 
  • Clicking against a friend

This is a small game i made for me and my friends. We click clicking and comparing how has the highest score.

Needs:
  • Java
  • Friends
  • A windows machine(Apple and Linux are coming soon)

I hope, you enjoy playing it.

If there are some problems and you need my support, join my support discord.

https://discord.gg/7DPXS6awHQ
